job_tasks.phrase: extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to work with and develop models, specifically generative AI and large-scale models.

job_tasks.phrase: talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the core task of building and deploying models, emphasizing scalability.
These are all fundamental stages in the model development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of tools and experiences for other engineers, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas
job_tasks.justification: Building and operating a development tool implies software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs
job_tasks.justification: This describes enabling others to develop solutions, which is often facilitated by software.

job_tasks.phrase: the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring robust deployment and scaling of solutions points to software engineering practices.
This is a direct mention of the MLOps category.
Productionizing models is a key aspect of MLOps.
Serving models in production is a core MLOps responsibility.
This phrase directly relates to the optimization of data processing, a key component of data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists
users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time
building and standardizing model dev experiences
This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and productionizing models, specifically highlighting generative AI and large-scale models, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The mention of extending modeling support to generative AI and the focus on user-facing developer tools also strongly supports this classification.
